title: School grades log
description: Each entry records the grade received for a specific course during the specified term.

start_calendar_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date marking the start of the grading period.

end_calendar_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date marking the end of the grading period.

school_level_isced.description: referencing International Standard Classification of Education ISCED 2011.

grade_letter.description: A = Excelent, B = Good, C = Average, D = Below Average, F = Failing
